pipeline.purpose: to get a general overview of AI
to fetch and summarize recent academic papers on AI
to gather the latest news and developments in AI
to synthesize information from Wikipedia, academic papers, and news into a detailed and coherent answer

plan.reasoning: To provide a comprehensive answer on AI, it is essential to gather information from a general overview source like Wikipedia, delve into academic literature using arxiv_summarizer for detailed insights, and optionally fetch the latest news articles to understand current trends and applications. Finally, the qa_engine will synthesize this information into a detailed explanation.
